value.latex:
Décomposer les fractions rationnelles suivantes~; en
calculer les primitives.
value.html: Décomposer les fractions rationnelles suivantes ; en calculer les primitives.
\(\displaystyle{1 \over a^2+x^2}\).

value.latex:
${1 \over x^2+a^2}$ est un élément simple.
Primitives~: ${1 \over a} \arctan({x \over a})+k$.
value.html: \({1 \over x^2+a^2}\) est un élément simple. Primitives : \({1 \over a} \arctan({x \over a})+k\).
\({1 \over{(1+x^2)}^2}\).

value.latex:
${1 \over{(1+x^2)}^2}$ est un élément simple.
Primitives~: ${1 \over2} \arctan x + {x \over2(1+x^2)}+k$.
value.html: \({1 \over{(1+x^2)}^2}\) est un élément simple. Primitives : \({1 \over2} \arctan x + {x \over2(1+x^2)}+k\).
\(\displaystyle{x^3 \over x^2-4}\).
\({x^3 \over x^2-4}=x+{2 \over x-2}+{2 \over x+2}\). Primitives : \({x^2 \over2}+ \ln(x^2-4)^2 +k\).
\(\displaystyle{4x \over{(x-2)}^2}\).
\({4x \over{(x-2)}^2}={4 \over x-2}+{8 \over{(x-2)}^2}\). Primitives : \(4 \ln\vert x-2\vert-{8 \over x-2}+k\).
\(\displaystyle{1 \over x^2+x+1}\).

value.latex:
${1 \over x^2+x+1}$ est un élément simple.
Primitives~: ${2 \over\sqrt3} \arctan{(2x+1) \over\sqrt3}+k$.
value.html: \({1 \over x^2+x+1}\) est un élément simple. Primitives : \({2 \over\sqrt3} \arctan{(2x+1) \over\sqrt3}+k\).
\(\displaystyle{1 \over{(t^2+2t-1)}^2}\).

\({1 \over{(t^2+2t-1)}^2} = {1 \over8{(t+1+ \sqrt2)}^2 }+ { \sqrt2 \over16(t+1+\sqrt2)} + {1 \over8{(t+1- \sqrt2)}^2}+ { - \sqrt2 \over16(t+1- \sqrt2)}\). Primitives : \(-{t+1 \over4(t^2+2t-1)} +{\sqrt2 \over16} \ln \left\vert{t+1+ \sqrt2 \over t+1- \sqrt2 } \right\vert+ k\).
\(\displaystyle{3t+1 \over{(t^2-2t+10)}^2}\).
\({3t+1 \over{(t^2-2t+10)}^2}\) est un élément simple. Primitives : \(-{3 \over2(t^2-2t+10)} +{2(t-1) \over9(t^2-2t+10)} +{2 \over27} \arctan({t-1 \over3}) +k\).
\(\displaystyle{3t+1 \over{t^2-2t+10}}\).

value.latex:
$ {3t+1 \over t^2-2t+10}$ est un élément simple.
Primitives~: ${3 \over2} \ln(t^2-2t+10) +{4 \over3} \arctan({t-1
\over3})+k$.
value.html: \({3t+1 \over t^2-2t+10}\) est un élément simple. Primitives : \({3 \over2} \ln(t^2-2t+10) +{4 \over3} \arctan({t-1 \over3})+k\).
\(\displaystyle{ 1 \over{t^3+1}}\).
\({1 \over t^3+1}={1 \over3(t+1)}-{t-2 \over3(t^2-t+1)}\). Primitives : \({1 \over3}\ln\vert t+1 \vert-{1 \over6} \ln( t^2-t+1) + {1 \over\sqrt3} \arctan({2t-1 \over\sqrt3}) +k\).
\(\displaystyle{x^3+2 \over{(x+1)}^2}\).
\({x^3+2 \over{(x+1)}^2}= x-2+{3 \over x+1}+{1 \over{(x+1)}^2}\). Primitives : \({x^2 \over2}-2x+3 \ln\vert x+1 \vert-{1 \over x+1} +k\).
\(\displaystyle{x+1 \over{x{(x-2)}^2}}\).
\({x+1 \over x{(x-2)}^2}= {1 \over4x}- {1 \over4(x-2)} +{3 \over2{(x-2)}^2}\). Primitives : \({1 \over4} \ln\vert x \vert-{1 \over4} \ln\vert x-2 \vert -{3 \over2(x-2)} +k\).
\(\displaystyle{(x^2-1)(x^3+3) \over2x+2x^2}\).
\({(x^2-1)(x^3+3) \over2x+2x^2}= {1 \over2} (x^3-x^2+3) -{3 \over2x}\). Primitives : \({x^4 \over8}-{x^3 \over6}+{3x \over2}-{3 \over2}\ln\vert x \vert+k\).
\(\displaystyle{x^2 \over{{(x^2+3)}^3 (x+1)}}\).

\({x^2 \over{(x^2+3)}^3(x+1)}={1 \over4^3(x+1)}+ {1-x \over4^3 (x^2+3)} + {1-x \over4^2 {(x^2+3)}^2} -{3(1-x) \over4{(x^2+3)}^3}\). Primitives : \(-{x+3 \over4^2{(x^2+3)}^2}-{2x-3 \over3.2^5(x^2+3)} -{1 \over2^7}\ln(x^2+3) - {1 \over3 \sqrt3 \, 2^6} \arctan({x \over\sqrt3}) +{1 \over4^3}\ln\vert x+1 \vert+k\).
\(\displaystyle{x^7+x^3-4x-1 \over x{(x^2+1)}^2}\).

value.latex:
${x^7+x^3-4x-1 \over x{(x^2+1)}^2}= x^2-2-{1 \over x} +{x+4 \over x^2+1}+
{x-6 \over{(x^2+1)}^2}$.\newline
Primitives~: ${x^3 \over3}-2x -\ln\vert x \vert+{1 \over2}\ln
(1+x^2) +\arctan x -{6x+1 \over2(x^2+1)} +k$.
value.html: \({x^7+x^3-4x-1 \over x{(x^2+1)}^2}= x^2-2-{1 \over x} +{x+4 \over x^2+1}+ {x-6 \over{(x^2+1)}^2}\). Primitives : \({x^3 \over3}-2x -\ln\vert x \vert+{1 \over2}\ln (1+x^2) +\arctan x -{6x+1 \over2(x^2+1)} +k\).
\(\displaystyle{3x^4-9x^3+12x^2-11x+7\over(x-1)^3(x^2+1)}\).

value.latex:
${3x^4-9x^3+12x^2-11x+7\over(x-1)^3(x^2+1)}={1\over
(x-1)^3}-{2\over(x-1)^2}+{3\over x-1}-{1\over x^2+1}$.\newline
Primitives~: $-{1/2\over(x-1)^2}+{2\over x-1}+3\ln\vert
x-1\vert-\arctan x +k$.
value.html: \({3x^4-9x^3+12x^2-11x+7\over(x-1)^3(x^2+1)}={1\over (x-1)^3}-{2\over(x-1)^2}+{3\over x-1}-{1\over x^2+1}\). Primitives : \(-{1/2\over(x-1)^2}+{2\over x-1}+3\ln\vert x-1\vert-\arctan x +k\).
